title: Can't index node in drupal 6
description:
My website using apache solr to search, can't search any content, i have install sold and tomcat success, but when index content to 100% show 0 documents index and 0% of the site content has been send to server.

Thanks!

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please move this discussion over to the Solr (or Drupal) user's list. This is likely some configuration issue rather than a bug in the code. 

If, through discussion on the various lists it is determined that there is a real code problem, we can re-open this JIRA or open a new one.
